title: New York Times Turkish Edition Promo
content:
A nice bit of animated type promoting the launch of a new Turkish edition of the gray lady.

[http://www.imagonewmedia.com/project.php?code=NYTT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018025136/http:/www.imagonewmedia.com/project.php?code=NYTT "http://www.imagonewmedia.com/project.php?code=NYTT")
author: Ken Messenger
